Articles.Title: Consuming REST API with Swagger
Articles.Description: Nick looks at consuming a REST based API by first importing its Swagger and using that to generate the code for accessing the API.
Articles.Author: Nick Randolph

Articles.Title: How To Convert Base 64 to Image in Xamarin
Articles.Description: Learn how to convert Image to base 64 and vice versa which is useful for transferring image data.
Articles.Author: Logesh Palani

Articles.Title: Visualizing Easings
Articles.Description: A useful site to view common easing curves on a range of interfaces.
Articles.Author: Works

Articles.Title: Stack Overflow Developer Survey 2020
Articles.Description: This report is based on a survey of 65,000 software developers from 186 countries around the world. [**Stack Overflow Developer Survey 2020**](https://insights.stackoverflow.com/survey/2020/?utm_source=social-share&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=dev-survey-2020) by [Stack Overflow]

Articles.Title: Code Snippet for Xamarin Month: It's all in the Name
Articles.Description: Naming is hard! But consistency is also important. In this entry to #XamarinMonth, Tom shares a code snippet for creating test methods, that help prompt for a consistent and clear naming style.
Articles.Author: Tom Soderling

Articles.Title: Building and releasing a Xamarin WatchOS app to TestFlight
Articles.Description: A really helpful and detailed story here from Damian on building and relasing a WatchOS app to TestFlight for beta testing. Not only does he cover how, but also the issues he faced and how he resolved them. A troubleshooting masterclass!
Articles.Author: Damian Mehers

Articles.Title: Simplifying Xamarin.Forms Grid Column and Row Definitions
Articles.Description: One of the downsides of XAML is that it can become very verbose. A specific area where this happens is when using a Grid and you start defining rows and columns. To overcome this, a change has been merged that will make your live (and XAML!) a whole lot easier. In this post you will learn how.
Articles.Author: Gerald Versluis

Articles.Title: Iconic Text Avatars
Articles.Description: Text Avatars are the most elegant alternative to profile pictures in modern design.  In this post, Ahmed shares how to achieve this with SkiaSharp.
Articles.Author: Ahmed Fouad

Articles.Title: Get started with TinyMvvm
Articles.Description: This is a tutorial that will guide you through how to get started building an app using Xamarin.Forms and TinyMvvm.
Articles.Author: Daniel Hindrikes

Articles.Title: Cleanup Your Xamarin.Forms MVVM Bindings Using Value Converters
Articles.Description: When working with Data Binding in Xamarin.Forms you can often end up with a property in your ViewModel that's of the wrong type or needs to be converted.
Articles.Author: Lachlan Gordon

Articles.Title: Snippets for TinyMvvm
Articles.Description: This blog post is a part of the Xamarin Month, a great initiative by Luis Matos. Daniel shares his favorite snippets for using TinyMvvm.
Articles.Author: Daniel Hindrikes

Articles.Title: Validation Snippets in Xamarin Forms
Articles.Description: In this article Charlin Agramonte shares snippets for form Validation which is an important part of any application that allows data entry.
Articles.Author: Charlin Agramonte

Articles.Title: Working with connectivity in Xamarin Forms
Articles.Description: As Developers, it's important to handle the connection states of our applications because you can make decisions based on what to show or do in our App when a certain state is notified.
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: Overriding Back Button in Xamarin.Forms Shell
Articles.Description: Udara shares lessons learnt about overriding the the Back Button navigation in Xamarin.Forms Shell applications.
Articles.Author: Udara Alwis

Articles.Title: Xamarin Month - XAML code snippets
Articles.Description: A lot of us love Xamarin.Forms and also love XAML. This #XamarinMonth entry from Andreas, sharing snippets of common XAML components we use like listview and collectionview, is definitely a really helpful one, not just for saving time but also helping you learn how the parts work if you are new to creating them.
Articles.Author: Andreas Nesheim

Articles.Title: Code Snippets for Xamarin.Forms BindableProperty
Articles.Description: Another post as part of #XamarinMonth CodeSnippets. This time a great one from Marco Siccardi on BindableProperty and how to speed up creating those!
Articles.Author: Marco Siccardi

Articles.Title: Sharpnado.Shadows
Articles.Description: For when one shadow is never enough - Sharpnado.Shadows is here to help you out.
Articles.Author: Jean-Marie Alfonsi

Articles.Title: Xamarin Community Standup - Build 2020 Recap + .NET MAUI
Articles.Description: Join the Mobile .NET Teams for our community standup covering great community contributions for Mobile .NET, Xamarin, Xamarin.Forms, Components, and more. This time doing a build recap and a dive into Maui.
Articles.Author: Xamarin Developers

Articles.Title: Build 2020 Updates
Articles.Description: James and Matt recap all of the great Xamarin announcements - and then you can go out and watch all the sessions. Plus this episode covers how to build iOS extension while reusing some Xamarin.Forms pages a new Azure + Mobile documentation center and so much more.

Articles.Title: Merge Conflict: 205: Monetization
Articles.Description: In episode 85 of running a business and building apps we discuss ads! Why your app and website should have them or maybe not and if so how to make money.
Articles.Author: Merge Conflict
